item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

*For Happy Hour Events, if you're only a "Maybe", please put a comment in your RSVP*

2/21/2011's location will be:
Black Bear Saloon

A 3,000 square foot pub-style restaurant and bar, with 27 flat-screen TVs, all with Direct TV sports packages.

SPECIALS:

From 6-8pm, get specials if you have one of our free bracelets, which you can get from the bartender by giving them my name (Jason), or ask me to get one for you.

$2 for draft beer, mixed drinks (not top shelf though), or wine.

If you're still there at 9pm, starting at 9 on Monday nights they do 2-for-1 appetizers. So, you know, soak up that alcohol before going home (or not)

Hope to see you all there!

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP (texting is fine; may be best if it's noisy)

PARKING: Street parking is often easiest to find northeast of the green...Temple St, Grove St, etc. Should be no charge from 7pm onwards. Or look at New Haven's parking garage map here

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Text me when you arrive if you can't spot us at the bar. My cell # is in my RSVP. Also, I'm tall...6'3"
